name: Jubilant Tribble Component Library
description: A collection of reusable HTML components for the Bootstrap 4.6 CMS environment. This file is the master blueprint for AI use.

usage_rules.structure: Do not modify the class names or HTML structure of components. Use them exactly as provided in the files.
usage_rules.content: Inner text, image src, and link href attributes found inside component files are considered placeholders and must be populated with new content.
usage_rules.placeholder_content_rule: CRITICAL RULE: The content inside component HTML files (text, images, links) is for demonstration only and is NOT explicitly marked as a 'placeholder'. You MUST treat all such content as a temporary example that MUST be completely replaced with new content during implementation. Do not merge, append, or mix the example content with the new content.

environment_dependencies.description: All components are designed to work within this specific technical environment. The custom_css file contains many important, pre-built styles that should be leveraged.

components.name: FAQ Accordion
components.description: A responsive and accessible accordion section for displaying a list of frequently asked questions.

components.name: FAQ Section with Infographic
components.description: A responsive, two-column component that displays a visual infographic on one side and a Bootstrap accordion for FAQs on the other. It is semantically structured with figure and figcaption.

components.name: Page Template: Hero + Sticky Nav (The Shell)
components.description: The main page template for building new content pages. It includes the hero, sticky navigation, breadcrumbs, and author meta-data. IMPORTANTLY, it also contains the necessary CSS to render the 'Pillar Page Snippets' correctly.
